name: Dragon Ball Z - Memory Game
description:
An entry for "One Minute Game Jam #4" About

A memory/matching game by Anagh's World using React v17.0.2

Gameplay

The objective of the game is to find similar characters. As soon as you make a match, the character gets unlocked and it is added to your drawer. There are 22 characters to be unlocked. So start playing and discover all the Dragon Ball Z characters.

Disclaimer

This is completely a fan-based game and I do not own any copyrights of the artwork/images used in this project.
